outputs.output_descr:
The UNDP-GEF has currently committed funds to develop a full size Environmental project to expand the scope of Protected Areas on Outer Islands aimed at conservation and biodiversity management. At present the scoping of the project is limited to Desroches, Alphonse, Poivre and Farquhar but does not exclude the possibility of expanding to other islands.
 
The project objective is promote the conversation & sustainable use of coastal & marine protected areas into the broader land and seascape while reducing the pressures on natural resources from competing land uses.

to carry out various conservation activities on those islands with ICS; to do spatial planning for the Outer Islands in general as well as land use plans for the 4 targeted islands; to build capacity of ICS and other partners for conservation in the Outer Islands, including management and financing of the protected areas; etc.

project_descr: The project's objective is promote the conservation and sustainable use of coastal and marine biodiversity in the Seychelles' Outer Islands
